text: Believe is the third studio album by Canadian pop singer, Justin Bieber. Believe was released on June 15, 2012 through Island Records. The album peaked at #1 on the Billboard 200 on both the weekly and year-end charts. As of December 2015, Belive has sold more than 1,610,000 copies in the US. It also peaked at #1 on the Argentine, Australian, Austrian, Canadian, Croatian, Danish, Greek, Irish, Italian, Mexican, New Zealand, Norwegian, Spanish, Swedish, and UK Album charts. On December 14, 2012, Bieber appeared on The Ellen DeGeneres Show and said that he was going to release an acoustic version of the album. He released it on January 29, 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2012 albums Category:Justin Bieber
